titleStmt.title: Keene 1617 an almanacke and prognostication for the yeare of our Lord God, 1617 : being the first yeare after the bissextile or leape yeare, the 35 from the reformed computation, and from the beginning of the world 5579 : composed properly for the latitude and meridian of London, and may well serue for the south part of Great Brittaine / by Iohn Keene ...
titleStmt.author: Keene, John, fl. 1612-1617.

titleStmt.title: Keene 1617 an almanacke and prognostication for the yeare of our Lord God, 1617 : being the first yeare after the bissextile or leape yeare, the 35 from the reformed computation, and from the beginning of the world 5579 : composed properly for the latitude and meridian of London, and may well serue for the south part of Great Brittaine / by Iohn Keene ...
titleStmt.author: Keene, John, fl. 1612-1617.

notesStmt.note: Second part has special t.p. with title: Keene 1617, a prognostication for this yeere of grace, 1617.
Imperfect: copy at reel 1862, tightly bound, with slight loss of text; copy at reel 1826 a fragment consisting of C2-3 only.
Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library (reel 1826) and Lambeth Palace Library (London, England) (reel 1862).
